group.label: ePay | Payment Solutions
group.comment:
Accept online payments in Magento 2 using the ePay payment window..
Go to Bambora Docs for more information.

field.label: Enabled:
field.comment: To enable and disable this payment method.

field.label: Title:
field.comment: The title of the payment method displayed to the customers.

field.label: Merchant number:
field.comment: The unique merchantnumber received from the payment system. If you don't know your merchantnumber please log into your account here. You can then find your merchantnumber from the menu Settings -> Payment System.

field.label: Payment Window ID:
field.comment: Defines the window to use. You can find the available windows on your account here. Go to the menu Settings -> Payment window.

field.label: Process payments from within the order administration of Magento:
field.comment:
Enable this option in order to capture, credit and delete payments directly from the Magento administration on the order page. You then don't need to enter the administration area of the payment system in order to process payments.

Important information when processing the payments from Magento:
- When an order is canceled the payment is deleted within the payment system.
- When an invoice is created the payment can be captured from the bottom of the invoice.
- When a credit memo is created the payment can be credited back to the customer from the bottom of the credit memo.

field.label: Remote password:
field.comment: If payments is processed from within the order administration and a password is added in the ePay administration is should also be added here.

field.label: Instant capture:
field.comment: This is used if you wish to capture the payments at the same time as it is authorized. This option may only be used if the cardholder receives the goods at once.

field.label: Instant invoice:
field.comment: This is used if you wish to create an invoice once the payment has been authorized.

field.label: Instant invoice mail:
field.comment: If instant invoice then send invoice to customer.

field.label: MD5 Key:
field.comment: This is the secret password you must enter both here and within the payment system if you enable MD5 above. Notice that the secret password must be 100% the same. Otherwise the customer will be declined as payments are made. You can log into your account on the payment system here. The MD5 settings are to be found from the menu Settings -> Payment System.

field.label: Window state:
field.comment: Set to Overlay for the Payment Window to open as a overlayed window on top of the store. The store will be visible behind the payment window. Set to Full Screen to open the payment window in the same window but in full-screen. The store will not be visible in this setting.

field.label: Use own receipt:
field.comment: If this option is enabled the customer will be redirected instantly to the Magento accept-page on approved authorization.

field.label: Enable Surcharge fee:
field.comment: Enable to add surcharge to the order

field.label: Surcharge mode:
field.comment: Select if the surcharge should be added as an order line or if it should be added to the shipping & handling fee

field.label: Enable invoice data:
field.comment: Collect invoice data and send to the payment window

field.label: Enable Mobile Payment Window:
field.comment: When using a mobile device use the mobile payment window

field.label: Send Email Order Confirmation:
field.comment: Enabling this setting will result in an order confirmation is e-mailed to the customer as the payment is made.

field.label: Mass invoice and capture mail:
field.comment: When bulk invoice and capture then send invoice mail to customer(s).

field.label: Rounding mode:
field.comment: Please select how you want the rounding of the amount sendt to the payment system

field.label: Order Status After Payment:
field.comment: The order status after payment is compleated

field.label: Sort order:
field.comment: In which order this payment method is displayed to the customer.
